mapper.insert: insert into evaluate(u_id, context, i_id) values (#{uId},#{context},#{iId})
mapper.select: select e.context,e.id,e.create_time,i.img_path,i.title,i.price from evaluate e,item i where e.i_id=i.id and e.u_id=#{uId};
select u.img_path,u.username,e.create_time,e.context from evaluate e,user u where e.u_id=u.id and e.i_id=#{iId};
